Uses of Package
com.game

  • Classes in com.game used by com.game 
    Class and Description
    Mastermind
    The Mastermind Class represent the logic of the game this game is characterized by the following information: You can switch between the game and the developer mode A variable who return if the result is true or false A menu with two style mode A menu with three games mode A possibility to replay the games A possibility to return on the main menu A chance number defined by the user A number case defined by the user A random number defined by the random number method A minimum number defined by the user A maximum number defined by the user A clue telling the user how many number are present in the user's game A clue telling the user how many number are well positioned in the user's game A given solution if the user is in developer mode A useful parameter 1 for the comparison table A useful parameter 2 for the comparison table A number chosen by the player A number chosen by brainy A number chosen by Mr computer A clues indicating each number if it is greater, inferior or equal to the result that the user must find User can chose his name A given solution if the user is in developer mode Dialogues for interactivity
